results.title: People in red hats
results.creator_credit: Jane Curtis, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Jane Curtis reflects on how she spent her childhood sitting in the loungeroom of her grandparents home. As her family spoke in a language she didn’t understand, Curtis was transfixed by the painting that hung on her grandparent’s wall. Only as an adult would she discover the mysteries that painting held. Created as part of an ACMI Digital Storytelling Program in the Digital Studio or outreach program.

results.title: My home
results.brief_description: A juxtaposition of Charlotte Rolfe’s life in the boarding house at MLC and her life on the land, her connections with both and how they have shaped her life.

results.title: Urban poetics
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
An abstract visual narrative about 21st century modern living and the absurdity of life. Themes of urban sprawl, desolation, commercialism and the mundanity of routine and the ordinary are all explored in this short film.

group_siblings.title: Attack of the strange insects from Uranus

results.title: Attack of the strange insects from Uranus
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
This mockumentary, depicting the zombie apocalypse, contains a hilarious collection of violence and gore. (Note that some scenes may disturb some viewers).
